text.section:
The Committee consists of seven members, appointed by the Board as follows:
On or before September 30, 2013, three individuals who practice perfusion and who:
Are certified by a national certifying board; and
Have a minimum of 2 years experience; and
On or after October 1, 2013, three licensed perfusionists;
Three physicians, at least one of whom performs cardiac or cardio-thoracic surgery; and
One consumer member.

section.section: The term of a member is 3 years.
The terms of members are staggered as required by the terms provided for members of the Committee on October 1, 2012.
At the end of a term, a member continues to serve until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
A member who is appointed after a term has begun serves only for the rest of the term and until a successor is appointed and qualifies.

text.section: From among its members, the Committee shall elect a chair every 2 years.
